languages.text: {n}Вояки с плохо скрываемым восторгом набивают рот деликатесами, заливая угощения баснословно дорогими напитками. Вряд ли им когда-либо доведется попробовать что-то столь же изысканное — об этом пире они будут рассказывать внукам.{/n}

{n}The enforcers are barely able to conceal their excitement as they shove delicious delicacies into their mouths, and wash them down with obscenely expensive drinks. They have never experienced anything like this before, and likely never will again. It is a feast they will not soon forget — a story they will tell to their grandchildren someday.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вояки с плохо скрываемым восторгом набивают рот деликатесами, заливая угощения баснословно дорогими напитками. Вряд ли им когда-либо доведется попробовать что-то столь же изысканное — об этом пире они будут рассказывать внукам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}With poorly concealed joy, the enforcers stuff their mouths full of delicacies, washing them down with obscenely expensive drinks. This is almost certainly the only chance they will ever get in their lives to taste something so exquisite — they will be telling stories about this feast to their grandchildren.{/n}

{n}With poorly concealed joy, the enforcers stuff their mouths full of delicacies, washing them down with obscenely expensive drinks. This is almost certainly the only chance they will ever get in their lives to taste something so exquisite — they will be telling stories about this feast to their grandchildren.{/n}

They have never experienced anything like this before, and likely never will again. It is a feast they will not soon forget — a story they will tell to their grandchildren someday.{/n}

{n}The enforcers are barely able to conceal their excitement as they shove delicious delicacies into their mouths, and wash them down with obscenely expensive drinks. They have never experienced anything like this before, and likely never will again. It is a feast they will not soon forget — a story they will tell to their grandchildren someday.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les prévôts s'exécutent avec un enthousiasme qu'ils ont bien du mal à dissimuler, dévorant avidement des mets fins accompagnés de boissons hors de prix. C'est la première et certainement la dernière fois qu'ils savourent un tel festin, une expérience mémorable qu'ils raconteront un jour à leurs petits-enfants.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers are barely able to conceal their excitement as they shove delicious delicacies into their mouths, and wash them down with obscenely expensive drinks. They have never experienced anything like this before, and likely never will again. It is a feast they will not soon forget — a story they will tell to their grandchildren someday.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les prévôts s'exécutent avec un enthousiasme qu'ils ont bien du mal à dissimuler, dévorant avidement des mets fins accompagnés de boissons hors de prix. C'est la première et certainement la dernière fois qu'ils savourent un tel festin, une expérience mémorable qu'ils raconteront un jour à leurs petits-enfants.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los guardias apenas pueden ocultar su deleite al llevarse la extraordinaria comida a la boca, acompañada de bebidas exageradamente caras. Nunca antes habían vivido algo así, y seguramente no vuelvan a hacerlo. Es un festín que no olvidarán; una historia que contarán algún día a sus nietos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers are barely able to conceal their excitement as they shove delicious delicacies into their mouths, and wash them down with obscenely expensive drinks. They have never experienced anything like this before, and likely never will again. It is a feast they will not soon forget — a story they will tell to their grandchildren someday.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los guardias apenas pueden ocultar su deleite al llevarse la extraordinaria comida a la boca, acompañada de bebidas exageradamente caras. Nunca antes habían vivido algo así, y seguramente no vuelvan a hacerlo. Es un festín que no olvidarán; una historia que contarán algún día a sus nietos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}两位执法者完全无法掩饰他们的兴奋之情。他们狼吞虎咽地把美味佳肴塞进嘴里，大口饮下昂贵的美酒。他们以前从来没品尝过这样的美味，以后也未必有机会再品尝了。他们恐怕永远都不会忘记这场盛宴，有朝一日，他们肯定会把这个故事讲给孙辈们听。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers are barely able to conceal their excitement as they shove delicious delicacies into their mouths, and wash them down with obscenely expensive drinks. They have never experienced anything like this before, and likely never will again. It is a feast they will not soon forget — a story they will tell to their grandchildren someday.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}两位执法者完全无法掩饰他们的兴奋之情。他们狼吞虎咽地把美味佳肴塞进嘴里，大口饮下昂贵的美酒。他们以前从来没品尝过这样的美味，以后也未必有机会再品尝了。他们恐怕永远都不会忘记这场盛宴，有朝一日，他们肯定会把这个故事讲给孙辈们听。{/n}

languages.text: {n}美味しい食事をほおばりながら、エンフォーサーは喜びを隠せないようだった。とてつもなく高い飲み物で、食事を飲み込んでいた。このような事は経験した事がなく、これからもないだろう。すぐには忘れられないご馳走で、いつか孫たちに語る話になるだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers are barely able to conceal their excitement as they shove delicious delicacies into their mouths, and wash them down with obscenely expensive drinks. They have never experienced anything like this before, and likely never will again. It is a feast they will not soon forget — a story they will tell to their grandchildren someday.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}美味しい食事をほおばりながら、エンフォーサーは喜びを隠せないようだった。とてつもなく高い飲み物で、食事を飲み込んでいた。このような事は経験した事がなく、これからもないだろう。すぐには忘れられないご馳走で、いつか孫たちに語る話になるだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mit unverhohlener Begeisterung stopfen sich die Enforcers köstliche Delikatessen in den Mund und spülen sie mit obszön teuren Getränken hinunter. So etwas haben sie noch nie erlebt und werden es vermutlich auch nie wieder tun. Sie werden dieses Festmahl nicht so bald vergessen. Vermutlich werden sie eines Tages noch ihren Enkeln davon berichten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers are barely able to conceal their excitement as they shove delicious delicacies into their mouths, and wash them down with obscenely expensive drinks. They have never experienced anything like this before, and likely never will again. It is a feast they will not soon forget — a story they will tell to their grandchildren someday.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnfazcılar, leziz yiyecekleri ağızlarına götürürken ve aşırı pahalı içecekler eşliğinde yutarken heyecanlarını gizlemeyi zar zor başarıyor. Daha önce böyle bir şey tecrübe etmemişlerdi ve muhtemelen bir daha da edemeyecekler. Bu, kolay kolay unutamayacakları bir ziyafet. Bir gün torunlarına anlatacakları bir hikâye.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcers are barely able to conceal their excitement as they shove delicious delicacies into their mouths, and wash them down with obscenely expensive drinks. They have never experienced anything like this before, and likely never will again. It is a feast they will not soon forget — a story they will tell to their grandchildren someday.{/n}
